name: JungleWP Ultimo
author: JungleWP Limited

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload junglewp-ultimo.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin outside JungleWP?

No, this plugin works only on JungleWP and allows WP Ultimo to synchronise your users domains to our Cloud Infrastructure seamlessly.

Where can I get my Website ID?

After purchasing your Multisite Plan, you will receive an email with your codes and starting guide to help you get started.
sections.changelog:
1.3

Added Network menu and fixed several issues related to netwok configuration.

1.2

  • Fixed description missing in plugin page.

1.1

  • Added readme description, and fixed support links.

1.0

  • first deployment.
sections.description:
This Plugin enables automatic domain syncing on JungleWP Hosting for WP Ultimo. With WP Ultimo You will be able to setup a network of premium DIY sites, like WordPress.com, in less than 5 minutes. You can find more detailed information about JungleWP Ultimo on docs.

Privacy Notices

With the default configuration, this plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • write any user personal data to the database;
  • send any data to external servers;
  • use cookies.

description:
This Plugin enables automatic domain syncing on JungleWP Hosting for WP Ultimo. With WP Ultimo You will be able to setup a network of premium DIY sites, like WordPress.com, in less than 5 minutes. You can find more detailed information about JungleWP Ultimo on docs.

Privacy Notices

With the default configuration, this plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • write any user personal data to the database;
  • send any data to external servers;
  • use cookies.
